name: EverQuest
description: Fixes the installer so it actually installs EverQuest (Live) standalone.
notes:
During Install:
* Do not run the DirectX optional components.
* xAfter logging in close the patcher to complete installation and re-launch game.

Post Install:

* Edit the eqclient.ini file
CPUAffinity0=-1
WindowedMode=TRUE
TextureCache=FALSE


Known Issues:

* Once you start the game, if you have a cursor that is off from where it clicks, just maximize the window and it will fix itself.
content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: EQ_setup.exe
    url: https://launch.daybreakgames.com/installer/EQ_setup.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/users/Public/Daybreak Game Company/Installed Games/EverQuest/LaunchPad.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    app: wmi
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Windows Management Interface
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    description: Simulating Windows reboot.
    executable: wineboot
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing EverQuest
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  single_cpu: true
wine:
  dxvk: false
  esync: false
